mapper.select: SELECT `T2`.song_id AS `songId`, `T2`.image_data AS `imageData`, `T2`.image_content_type AS `imageContentType`, `T2`.image_file_name AS `imageFileName`, `T2`.title AS `title`, `T2`.artist_id AS `artistId`, `T2`.album_id AS `albumId`, `T2`.data_video_id AS `dataVideoId`, `T2`.duration AS `duration`, `T3`.`name` AS `artistName` FROM `ss`.`playlist_songs` AS `T1` LEFT JOIN `ss`.`song` AS `T2` ON T1.song_id = T2.`song_id` LEFT JOIN ss.artist AS T3 ON T2.artist_id = T3.artist_id WHERE T1.playlist_index = #{playlistIndex}
